title: They need to reach out to us  Canadians on Norwegian Jewel trying to get on government s radar
description: A Canadian tourist who says there are hundreds of Canadian passengers aboard a cruise ship that is being turned away from one port after another during the COVID   crisis  has a message for the federal government   They need to reach out to us
